entry.title: The Race To Replace Africa’s Forest-Killing Fuel

media:group.media:title: The Race To Replace Africa’s Forest-Killing Fuel
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: How Senegal Is Saving Its Mangroves

media:group.media:title: How Senegal Is Saving Its Mangroves
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: How India Made Cricket a Billion-Dollar Business

media:group.media:title: How India Made Cricket a Billion-Dollar Business
media:group.media:description:
At the turn of the century, cricket was struggling to attract audiences and its commercial future was in doubt. Now it boasts the second-most valuable sporting franchise globally, behind only the NFL. This is the story of how one country changed the fate of cricket.

entry.title: Inside the Global Fight to Save Coffee

media:group.media:title: Inside the Global Fight to Save Coffee
media:group.media:description:
Humanity consumes a half-trillion cups of coffee every year, yet coffee production is one of the most antiquated industries within agriculture. Now the livelihoods of 125 million people working in coffee are at risk as the crop struggles to cope with global warming.
#coffee #bloombergquicktake #food -------- Like this video? Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/Bloomberg?sub_confirmation=1 Become a Quicktake Member for exclusive perks: http://www.youtube.com/bloomberg/join Subscribe to Quicktake Explained: https://bit.ly/3iERrup

entry.title: Hijacking and Murder in Global Shipping’s Grim Underbelly

media:group.media:title: Hijacking and Murder in Global Shipping’s Grim Underbelly
media:group.media:description:
In July 2011, the oil tanker Brillante Virtuoso was drifting through the treacherous Gulf of Aden when a crew of pirates attacked and set her ablaze. When David Mockett, a maritime surveyor, inspected the vessel, he was left with more questions than answers. Soon after his inspection, Mockett was killed in a car bombing.
Storylines follows Bloomberg reporters as they uncover some of the biggest financial crimes of the modern era. Watch more: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqq4LnWs3olW48FfG_5s1jL_ru47Z3QGq

entry.title: VR Sports Could Save Mark Zuckerberg's ‘Metaverse’

media:group.media:title: VR Sports Could Save Mark Zuckerberg's ‘Metaverse’
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Cambodia to Museums: We Want Our Statues Back

entry.title: How Bongbong Won Over the Philippines

media:group.media:title: How Bongbong Won Over the Philippines
media:group.media:description:
Despite his father's record of corruption and violence, Ferdinand Marcos Jr, known as Bongbong, won a landslide election in the Philippines. Did an online disinformation campaign help tip the scales?
#philippines #bongbongmarcos #bloombergquicktake
